page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE-WEEK-END.
page.content: First thing I have my breakfast.I then feed my pony and the chickens with my friend Diane.After about an hour I ride my pony,usually with Mum,until about 11-30a.m.Afterwards I sometimes ride my bike.I help Mum with the washing and shopping.Dinner is at 1p.m.for us,because Dad is a farmer and always has too much to do.Diane and I sometimes meet Charlotte and Eliza on our bikes.If it is hot we swim in the river and sunbathe in Dad's field.We go home at 4 to feed the horses and chickens.After that we do various things like taking messages and delivering schedules.After tea at 5 I usually read,watch T.V. or do anything I want to.I go to bed at about 9-30,but get to sleep at about 12.
